actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the assassination of Kemal Arikan, a consul general of the Government of Turkey assigned to the United States.

summary.text: Condemns the assassination of Kemal Arikan, a consul general of Turkey assigned to the United States. Expresses the sympathy of the Senate for his family, his government, and his people. Urges law enforcement authorities to investigate and prosecute the offenders to the maximum extent practicable and to take appropriate steps to deter future attacks.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the assassination of Kemal Arikan, a consul general of the Government of Turkey assigned to the United States.
